option_to_terminate.definition_of_substantial_damage: serious damage or destruction rendering unusable 33% or more of the rentable square feet
option_to_terminate.tenant_obligations_on_termination: pay all Base Rent, Rent and other sums accrued through termination date
option_to_terminate.rent_abatement_condition: proportion to the floor area rendered substantially unusable

no_termination_clause.tenant_liability: remains for full Base Rent, Rent and all other sums
no_termination_clause.tenant_waiver: waives right to surrender Lease or seek rent reduction due to damage or destruction
